analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, The Numerical Series of the Law of Conditionality in Pairs
The section on the effluents, The law of conditionality in terms of causes

original: Noāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: noāsavam na hetum dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an object not an effluent not a cause there arises an object an effluent a cause by way of condition of cause … three.

original: Nanoāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Noāsavaṁ nahetuñca nanoāsavaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na noāsavam na hetum dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  noāsavam na hetuñca na noāsavam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With an object not an effluent not a cause there arises an object an effluent a cause by way of condition of cause … one.🔽With an object not an effluent not a cause and an object not an effluent not a cause there arises an object an effluent a cause by way of condition of cause … one. (In brief.) With a cause five … With an effect one … With an indeterminate five.

original: Noāsavaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: noāsavam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka
translated: With an object not an effluent not a cause there arises an object not an effluent not a cause by way of condition of cause … one.

original: Nanoāsavaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Noāsavaṁ nanahetuñca nanoāsavaṁ nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na noāsavam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi 🔽noāsavam na na hetuñca na noāsavam na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ na hetu dhammo
translated: With an object an effluent not a cause there arises an object not an effluent not a cause by way of condition of cause … three.🔽With an object an effluent not a cause and an object not an effluent not a cause there arises an object not an effluent not a cause by way of condition of cause …

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate
translated: … with cause as condition … one … (Abbreviated.) … with cause as condition, five … (Abbreviated.) … with result as condition, one … (Abbreviated.) … with non-causality as condition, five … (Abbreviated.)
